data.actual_result: Button does nothing and that status bar goes from white to black making it difficult to read. You have to kill the app to fix it.
data.expected_result: The button should work, i.e. A pop-up should ask to open the App Store page or Spotify/Twitch
data.short_description: Status bar goes black when tapping on the Play on Spotify button and button doesn’t work in the mini-profile
data.steps_to_repro: - Prerequisite: Uninstall Spotify, set your browser to the In-App Browser and set your theme to the dark theme.  - Find a user that's listening to Spotify and look at their profile - Click on the Play on Spotify button.- For the second part, find a user in the member list that is currently listening or streaming on Twitch - Tap on their name to open the mini-profile- Tap on the button
